summary: Can you tell me how you went about reading all the villanelle parts, I can only find the physical copy of the first book/part...
question: Can you tell me how you went about reading all the villanelle parts, I can only find the physical copy of the first book/part and I’d prefer it that way, I’m not sure if it’s just on kindle....
answer: Hiya! I pre-ordered the whole thing on iBooks, and when it was published I downloaded it and read the whole thing on my phone in one go :)

summary: ALL CAPS, all the time: why are so many shows bombarding us with giant fonts?
title: ALL CAPS, all the time: why are so many shows bombarding us with giant fonts?
excerpt: From Killing Eve to Mindhunter and Narcos, there’s a trend in TV for colossal captions. It’s a confident style choice that nods to noir fiction. Jack Seale October 26, 2018 The Guardian David Finch…

summary: My dad is watching Killing Eve (finally, I’ve been telling him to for ages) and he’s enjoying it.  He is, however, disturbed...
body:
My dad is watching Killing Eve (finally, I’ve been telling him to for ages) and he’s enjoying it. 

He is, however, disturbed that Villanelle is such a likable character. Clearly, he has not watched enough shows where the antagonist is more likable than the protagonist.

reblog.comment:

summary: Omg, did I understand that ask correctly??? You're working on a postlude for The Void??? Ahhhhhhh Like, even if you are only...
question: Omg, did I understand that ask correctly??? You're working on a postlude for The Void??? Ahhhhhhh Like, even if you are only considering it, THANK YOU SO MUCH ASLKFHGAGS.
answer: Hahaha hey and yes, I am in fact doing a Postlude for The Void. The events are mapped out in my head, so it’s just a matter of finding the time to write it out, but it’s coming before S2, because once that airs, I will probably have to do a whole new series with new events…

reblog.comment: Hahaha hey and yes, I am in fact doing a Postlude for The Void. The events are mapped out in my head, so it’s just a matter of finding the time to write it out, but it’s coming before S2, because once that airs, I will probably have to do a whole new series with new events…
